20110110161819.000|20110110161820.000|CC1|     A PRESCRIPTION MEDICINE    
20110110161820.000|20110110161822.000|CC1|   PROVEN TO TREAT DEPRESSION.  
20110110161822.000|20110110161823.000|CC1|    PRISTIQ IS THOUGHT TO WORK  
20110110161823.000|20110110161823.000|CC1|    BY AFFECTING THE LEVELS OF

20110110161827.000|20110110161830.000|CC1|   IF YOUR DEPRESSION WORSENS   
20110110161830.000|20110110161830.000|CC1|   OR YOU HAVE UNUSUAL CHANGES

20110110161831.000|20110110161833.000|CC1|     OR THOUGHTS OF SUICIDE.    
20110110161833.000|20110110161833.000|CC1|  ANTI-DEPRESSANTS CAN INCREASE 
20110110161833.000|20110110161835.000|CC1|        SUICIDAL THOUGHTS

20110110161835.000|20110110161838.000|CC1|     TEENS, AND YOUNG ADULTS.   
20110110161838.000|20110110161838.000|CC1|     PRISTIQ IS NOT APPROVED    
20110110161838.000|20110110161840.000|CC1|     FOR CHILDREN UNDER 18.     
20110110161840.000|20110110161842.000|CC1| DO NOT TAKE PRISTIQ WITH MAOIS.
20110110161842.000|20110110161842.000|CC1|          TAKING PRISTIQ        
20110110161842.000|20110110161844.000|CC1|    WITH NSET PAIN RELIEVERS,   
20110110161844.000|20110110161844.000|CC1|   ASPIRIN, OR BLOOD THINNERS   
20110110161844.000|20110110161848.000|CC1|   MAY INCREASE BLEEDING RISK.
